div.p: Must applications comply with this constraint?
This value set defines it's own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/constraint-severity

tr.td: If the constraint is violated, the resource is not conformant
If the constraint is violated, the resource is conformant, but it is not necessarily following best practice.
